EntryName	CCN5_HUMAN
ProteinName	CCN family member 5 (Connective tissue growth factor-like protein) (CTGF-L) (Connective tissue growth factor-related protein 58) (WNT1-inducible-signaling pathway protein 2) (WISP-2)
GeneName	CCN5 CT58 CTGFL WISP2 UNQ228/PRO261
Length	250
Function	May play an important role in modulating bone turnover. Promotes the adhesion of osteoblast cells and inhibits the binding of fibrinogen to integrin receptors. In addition, inhibits osteocalcin production.
Subcellular Location	Secreted
